The Better Bracket Act of 1998, specifically section 2, amends the tax imposed on married individuals filing joint returns and surviving spouses by reducing individual income tax rates. - Over $102,300 but not over $155,950: $21,104 plus 31% of the excess over $102,300
- Over $155,950 but not over $278,450: $37,735.5 plus 36% of the excess over $155,950
